mdRecord.dcterms:title: The miller and the maid / written and composed by Theo. Marzials
Can't you stay one tiny moment?
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Marzials, Theophilus, 1850-1920
mdRecord.dcterms:description: For voice and piano or organ.
Imprint date inferred from notice on p. [3]: "The above is a reproduction of the 24th page of woman's edition 'Washington Times', July 4, 1895."
Title page illustration: Cartouche with Bromo-Seltzer bottle and a woman playing a Stieff piano.
Advertisement on p. [3]: "Bromo-Seltzer .. for the cure of headache."
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Bromo-Seltzer collection of 74 popular songs : complete and unabridged, full music size with piano and organ accompaniment
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Songs with piano
Songs with organ
Popular music--United States--To 1901.
